Gudmundur Mar Gunnarsson, Launch site

04 Oct 2016

Well. Finally got around to putting this old website together. Neat thing about it - powered by Jekyll and I can use Markdown to author my posts. It actually is a lot easier than I thought it was going to be. I went through this little tutorial here: Creating and Hosting a Personal Site on GitHub.
